snippet: The Security Council unanimously passed a resolution on Friday authorizing the use of military force to assist Mali’s government in reclaiming the northern half of the country.
abstract: United Nations Security Council unanimously passes resolution authorizing use of military force to assist Mali’s government in reclaiming the northern half of country from radical Islamists.
lead_paragraph: The Security Council unanimously passed a resolution on Friday authorizing the use of military force to assist Mali’s government in reclaiming the northern half of the country.

headline.main: Security Council Seeks to Aid Mali
headline.print_headline: Security Council Seeks to Aid Mali
